about_the_game:
Background

I met a devil who wants to play a game with me.

We will flip coins until one shows tails.

Once that happens, I can keep all the coins except for the one showing tails;

But I will lose a little bit of blood.

Sounds like a good deal, doesn't it?

The game

I flip a coin.

If heads, automatically flip another coin and repeat the process until tails.

If tails, I gain all the coins except for the one showing tails, but I lose one blood.

If I have no blood left, the game is over.

Otherwise, clear the board and start a new round.

Devil's offer

Every time I lose a heart, the devil offers three items for sale.

I can use the coins I earned from the previous round to purchase those items.

Those items will make my next round better.

However, some offers look suspicious...
